home.name: Home
home.part1: Some Front-End projects made using HTML, CSS, Javascript, ReactJS and Angular

repository.rpg-apps-angular-desc: A simple RPG companion app with dice roller, game hooks, loot generator, initiative tracker and npc generator for dnd 4th edition
repository.todo-app-desc: A Todo List App. User can add Todo, toggle status and remove Todo. React course by Dev Ed.
repository.pokedex-desc: A Simple Pokedex. You can search Pokemons by name and see their details. Api used: pokeapi
repository.wwe-trivia-rumble-desc: A list with trivia questions related to WWE. You can filter by typing the question on the input box.
repository.tour-of-heroes-desc: Angular Tutorial. List of Super Heroes
repository.lost-judgement-tsx-desc: Material List for the game Lost Judgement
repository.text-adventure-react-desc: A very simple and short text adventure game based on 70's and 80's games

about.name: About
about.part2:
This page was made using ReactJs.
Components used:

skills.name: Skills
skills.html5Desc: HTML5 (Hypertext Markup Language) is a markup language for publishing text and multimedia content on the web.
skills.css3Desc: CSS is a style language, used to style an HTML document
skills.sassDesc: SASS is a CSS extension language with more efficient syntax and other css features
skills.jsTsDesc: Javascript is a programming language that allows interactive web pages. Along with HTML and CSS, it is an essential part of web applications. TypeScript is a strict syntactic superset of JavaScript with syntax added for types.
skills.reactDesc: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces.
skills.angularDesc: Angular is an application design framework and development platform to create efficient and sophisticated single-page applications.
skills.bootstrapDesc: Bootstrap is a powerful front-end toolkit packed with features.
skills.githubDesc: GitHub is a file and version-controlled file hosting platform using Git. It allows developers, utilities or any user registered on the platform to contribute to private and/or Open Source projects from anywhere in the world.
